Red red bụ nri Ghana nke nwere anya ojii, nke a na-esi na mmanụ nkwụ / mmanụ akwụkwọ nri na plantain. Nri ahụ nwetara aha ya site na ụcha uhie ọ na-ewere site na mmanụ nkwụ uhie (zomi) na plantain esiri esi
Red red na-ejikarị azụ, dị ka mackerel ma ọbụ pilchards, peas nwere anya ojii, ose, yabasị, mmanụ na tomato. A maara ya na Ghana dị ka "kokoo ne beans"
Ọ bụ ezie  a na-ejikarị azụ̀ eme ya, red nwekwara ike ịbụ onye na-eri akwụkwọ nri. Enwere ike inye ya plantain, avocado, na osikapa ma ọ bụ garri maka nri zuru ezu.
